questions.quote: Uh, hang on a second, You know what? Changed my mind, make it a tuck.
Hey, you're not talking that Michigan deposit bottle scam again, are you?
That's, that's incredible. My Cousin Vinnie, I love her, she was fantastic!
I mean I met her three times. I don't even know her last name.
I love the mirror in that bathroom! I don't know what in the hell it is. I look terrific in that mirror.  I don't know if it's the tile or the lighting... I feel like Robert Wagner.
Helen, did you know that they tape this thing in the afternoon?
No, not in so many words but I believe we had an understanding.
Well, you know... the friend meeting the new woman. I feel like I'm getting fixed up for a friendship.
Elaine! Where's Susie? I want her to head up our new Fingerless Glove Division.
Well, I ah.. been havin' trouble at home and uh.. I mean, ah, you know, I'll work harder, nights, weekends, whatever it takes..
